'''The Green Dragon''' is the seventh track of disc one of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].

==Lyrics==
<poem>
Oh, you can search far and wide, you can drink the whole town dry!
But you'll never find a bear so brown as the one we drink in our hometown!
You can keep your fancy ales! You can drink 'em by the flagon!
But the only brew for the brave and true comes from [[Green Dragon|The Green Dragon!]]
</poem>
{{title}}
